verses.verse: By <S%H3915>night<s%> on my <S%H4904>bed<s%> I <S%H1245>sought<s%> him whom my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H157>loves<s%>: I <S%H1245>sought<s%> <S%H4672>him<s%>, but I found him not.

I will <S%H6965>rise<s%> <S%H5437>now<s%>, and go about the <S%H5892>city<s%> in the <S%H7784>streets<s%>, and in the broad <S%H7339>ways<s%> I will <S%H1245>seek<s%> him whom my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H157>loves<s%>: I <S%H1245>sought<s%> <S%H4672>him<s%>, but I found him not.
The <S%H8104>watchmen<s%> that go <S%H5437>about<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H7200>me<s%>: to whom I said, Saw you him whom my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H157>loves<s%>?

It was but a <S%H4592>little<s%> that I <S%H5674>passed<s%> from <S%H4672>them<s%>, but I found him whom my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H157>loves<s%>: I <S%H270>held<s%> <S%H7503>him<s%>, and would not let him go, until I had <S%H935>brought<s%> him into my <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>, and into the <S%H2315>chamber<s%> of her that conceived <S%H2029>me<s%>.

I <S%H7650>charge<s%> <S%H1323>you<s%>, O you daughters of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, by the <S%H6643>roes<s%>, <S%H176>and<s%> by the <S%H355>hinds<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%>, that you stir not <S%H5782>up<s%>, nor <S%H5782>awake<s%> my <S%H160>love<s%>, until he <S%H2654>please<s%>.

Who is this that <S%H5927>comes<s%> out of the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> like <S%H8490>pillars<s%> of <S%H6227>smoke<s%>, <S%H6999>perfumed<s%> with <S%H4753>myrrh<s%> and <S%H3828>frankincense<s%>, with all <S%H81>powders<s%> of the <S%H7402>merchant<s%>?
Behold his <S%H4296>bed<s%>, which is <S%H8010>Solomon<s%>'s; <S%H8346>sixty<s%> <S%H1368>valiant<s%> men are <S%H5439>about<s%> <S%H1368>it<s%>, of the valiant of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

They all <S%H270>hold<s%> <S%H2719>swords<s%>, being <S%H3925>expert<s%> in <S%H4421>war<s%>: every <S%H376>man<s%> has his <S%H2719>sword<s%> upon his <S%H3409>thigh<s%> because of <S%H6343>fear<s%> in the <S%H3915>night<s%>.

He <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H5982>pillars<s%> there of <S%H3701>silver<s%>, the <S%H7507>bottom<s%> there of <S%H2091>gold<s%>, the <S%H4817>covering<s%> of it of <S%H713>purple<s%>, the <S%H8432>middle<s%> there being <S%H7528>paved<s%> with <S%H160>love<s%>, for the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

Go <S%H3318>forth<s%>, O you <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%>, and <S%H7200>behold<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> with the <S%H5850>crown<s%> with which his <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H5849>crowned<s%> him in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of his <S%H2861>espousals<s%>, and in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H8057>gladness<s%> of his <S%H3820>heart<s%>.
